Artists: Prabhas Raju Uppalapati, Shriya Saran, Bhanupriya, Pradeep Rawat, Kota Srinivasa Rao, Kamal Kamaraju,  Ajay, L.B. Sriram, Venu Madhav.

Name: Amma Nanna O Tamila Ammayi
Plot: A former kick-boxer, after death of his wife, trains his son who hates him for boxing match for revenge on his former student
Artists: Ravi Teja, Prakash Raj, Jayasudha

Name: Rail (Thodari)
Plot: A cafeteria worker, a young girl, and a gang of hijackers come together aboard a train
Artists: Dhanush, Keerthi Suresh, Ganesh Venkatraman

Name: Yamadonga
Plot: A charming thief's (N.T.R. Rao Junior) life is cut short when he angers the Yama (Mohan Babu), the vengeful god of death.
Artists: N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Mohan Babu, Priyamani

Name: Gunde Jaari Gallanthayyinde
Plot: A man is smitten by a woman and gets her number and begins to talk to her but realises that he has been talking to someone else, who has fallen for him. When the second woman learns the truth, she plots revenge.
Artists: Starring Nithiin, Nithya Menen, Isha Talwar , Ali, Thagubothu Ramesh, Madhunandan, Raghubabu, Ahuti Prasad, Sudha, Duvvasi Mohan, Sandya Janak, Arun Kumar, Jwala Gutta among others.

Name: Aagadu
Plot: Shankar is an orphan raised by a sincere police officer Raja Rao. In an unexpected situation, Raja Rao's son Bharath kills a kid and Shankar takes the blame, and is imprisoned while Raja Rao warns him not to meet him again.
Artists: Mahesh Babu,  Tamannah, Sonu Sood, Rajendra Prasad, Brahmanandam, Asish Vidyardhi, Ajay, Vennela Kishore, Nassar, Raghu Karumanchi, Posani Krishna Murali

Name: Dharma Yogi (Kodi)
Plot: An idealistic man and his identical obverse, an ambitious politician, navigate life in parallel. Which one will achieve the good life?
Artists: Dhanush, Trisha, Anupama Parameswaran, SA Chandrasekhar, Saranya Ponvannan, Kaali Venkat, Singamuthu, Namo Narayana, G Marimuthu.

Name: Bujjigadu
Plot: Bujji(Prabhas) runs away from his home in his childhood because of a dispute with his girlfriend Chitti(Trisha). He ends up in Chennai for 12 years, and the rest of the story is about how they meet now to make their love successful.
Artists: Prabhas, Trisha Krishnan and  Mohan Babu.

Name: Munna
Plot: Munna is a college student and his aim is to kill Kakha-a mafia don. He is unaware of the fact that Kakha is his estranged father who had killed his mother and he wants to take revenge.
Artists: Prabhas, Ileana, Prakash Raj, Kota, Rahul Dev, Tanikella Bharani, Venu Madhav, Posani Krishna Mural

Name: Avanthika
Plot: A man realizes his apartment is haunted by the spirit of a young woman. A clash between Myth and Reality.
Artists: Poorna, Dhanraj, Shakalaka Shankar, Sayaji Shinde and Ajay Ghosh.

Name: Race Gurram
Plot: Two brothers have two different approaches to life. While one brother follows rules and regulations, the other does things his own way.
Artists: Allu Arjun, Shruti Haasan, Shaam

Name: Bheemili Kabaddi Jattu
Plot: Suri, a kabaddi player, hopes to represent his team in a prestigious tournament. But he is not selected. In a practice match before the tournament, he helps his team win a close match.
Artists: Nani, Saranya Mohan, Kishore, Keerthi, Dhanraj, Vinay, Chanti

Name: Chirutha
Plot: A young man with a tragic past meets the daughter of a rich man and falls in love, while trying to avenge the death of his father.
Artists: Ram Charan, Neha Sharma, Ashish Vidyarthi, Prakash Raj, Ali, Brahmanandam

Name: Uyyala Jampala
Plot: Cousins Soori and Uma Devi grow up in the same neighborhood and fight constantly. As they grow older, they realize they are perfect for each other and get married
Artists: Raj Tarun, Avika Gor, Punarnavi Bhupalam

Name: Namo Venkatesa
Plot: Ramana, a ventriloquist, falls in love with Pooja, the daughter of a rich factionist, while on tour in Europe. When she is forced to marry against her wish, Ramana and her uncle decide to rescue her.
Artists: Venkatesh, Trisha, Brahmanandam, Ali, Kota Srinivasarao, Telangana Shakuntala among others.

Name: Ramayya Vasthavayya
Plot: In a small village, three evil men kill a lot of innocent people to grab their lands. After losing all of his loved ones, Ammulu, a young man, seeks revenge.
Artists: N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Shruti Haasan

Name: Sye
Plot: Pruthvi and Sashank are rugby players who can't stand each other. When they are challenged by a criminal over a rugby match, they join forces to defeat the mafioso who desires to confiscate their land.
Artists: Nithiin, Genelia D'Souza, Shashank Shekhar

Name: Shathamanam Bhavathi
Plot: The anguish that negligent children can cause is depicted here from the parents' perspective.
Artists: Sharwanand, Anupama Parameswaran, Tanikella Bharani, Chalapathi Rao, Indraja

Name: Billa
Plot: When Billa, an underworld don, dies at the hands of ACP Murthy, he's replaced by Ranga, his lookalike, to infiltrate the gang. When Murthy is killed, Ranga is trapped since only Murthy knew the truth.
Artists: Prabhas Krishnam Raju Anushka Namitha Hansika Motwani Jayasudha Supreet Kelly Dorji Rehman & Ali among others.

Name: Pandemkodi (Sandakozhi)
Plot: A college student who goes on vacation to his friend's home gets involved with the local goon who terrorizes the town.
Artists: Vishal, Meera Jasmine, Raj Kiran

Name: Josh
Plot: Satya is a college student. He discontinues his graduation studies in Vizag and comes to Hyderabad in search of a job. He runs into a fight with local college students who are influenced by
Artists: Naga Chaitanya Akkineni, Karthika Nair, J.D. Chakravarthi

Name: Pokiri
Plot: The movie revolves around a criminal who works for the underworld, but secretly is an undercover cop. His dire plan is to bring the don out of his den and kill him.
Artists: Mahesh Babu, Ileana, Prakash Raj, Sayaji Shinde, Asish Vidyardhi, Nasseer, Brahmanandam, Ali, Venu Madhav.

Name: Panjaa
Plot: Jai, an orphan, is mentored by a gangster, Bhagawan and grows up to be a henchman. When Jai beats Bhagawan's son to death for killing an innocent girl, he invites Bhagawan's wrath.
Artists: Pawan Kalyan, Sarah-Jane Dias, Anjali Lavania among others.

Name: Rechipo
Plot: Siva steals crores of money from the Home Minister's residence that actually belongs to a gangster. Siva must save the Home Minister's daughter, who is kidnapped by the gangster.
Artists: Nithiin, Ileana D'Cruz, Ali.

Name: Alai Payuthey (Sakhi)
Plot: A computer expert (Madhavan) and a crusading doctor (Shalini) marry in secret, then deal with death and trauma.
Artists: Madhavan, Shalini, Mani Ratnam

Name: Bichagadu (Pichaikkaran)
Plot: After his mother meets with an accident in her factory, a rich businessman becomes a beggar for 48 days, in order to save her life.
Artists: Vijay Antony, Satna Titus, Bagavathi Perumal

Name: Varsham
Plot: A man and a woman coincidentally bump into each other every time it rains and eventually fall for each other. The woman's father causes misunderstandings between them in order to get her married to a man of his liking.
Artists: Raghu Babu, Chandramohan, Tottempudi Gopichand, Prabhas, Trisha Krishnan

Name: Mariyan (Maryan)
Plot: In Sudan, three Indian oil workers are kidnapped and held hostage by mercenaries.
Artists: Dhanush, Parvathy, Salim Kumar

Name: Pogaru
Plot: Ganesh comes to Chennai to pursue his studies. A group of goons are on his pursuit. A kind hearted Ganesh is eventually forced to go back to his old ways to fight them and restore order.
Artists: Vishal Krishna, Reema Sen, Sriya Reddy, Manoj K. Jayan, Vadivelu, Vinayakan TK, I.M. Vijayan

Name: Okkadine
Plot: Shailaja, Shivaji Rao's daughter, is deeply moved by the affection she gets from Surya's family. However, when she learns the truth about his family, she is shocked.
Artists: Nara Rohith, Nithya Menon, Ali

Name: Yamudiki Mogudu: Ee Nela Thakkuvodu
Plot: Due to a celestial error, Naresh is born without a fate and all pleads to kill him go unheard in Yama's court. When Yama is finally forced to deal with the situation, Naresh follows him to his kingdom.
Artists: AllariNaresh, Richa Panai, Sayaji Shinde, Ramya Krishna, Krishna Bhagawan, Bharath, AVS, Dhanraj

Name: Malaikottai (bhiyya)
Plot: A young man is granted conditional bail, which requires him to go to the Trichy police station. On his way there, he falls for a beautiful girl. When the girl lands up in trouble, he finds himself facing the wrath of powerful politicians.
Artists: Vishal, Priyamani, Ajay, Ashish Vidyarthi, Devaraj, Urvasi, Nirosha, Music Mani Sharma.

Name: Govindudu Andarivadele
Plot: A man returns to India to find his family on the brink of a rift. He must push past his tendency to take everything lightly and work to heal his clan.
Artists: Ram Charan, Kajal Aggarwal, Srikanth

Name: Seethamma Vakitlo Sirimalle Chettu
Plot: Relangi Mavayya (Prakash Raj) is a gentleman from a small village Relangi and he believes in human values and relationships. He has two sons Peddodu aka Mallikharjuna Rao (Venkatesh) and
Artists: Venkatesh Daggubati, Mahesh Babu, Samantha Ruth Prabhu

Name: Sukumarudu
Plot: Sukumar, a selfish wealthy man, returns to his village in order to ascertain his rights over the family property. However, he faces problems due to a few family members and ends up falling in love.
Artists: Aadi, Nisha Aggarwal, Ghattamaneni Krishna, Sharada, Chandra Mohan

Name: Bruce Lee - The Fighter
Plot: Kartik sacrifices his studies for his sister and becomes a stunt man. Often mistaken for an undercover policeman, Kartik helps unearth the evil designs of businessmen Deepak Raj and Jayaraj.
Artists: Ram Charan, Rakul Preet Singh, Ali, Brahmanandam

Name: DJ Duvvada Jagannadham
Plot: An honest man goes to great lengths to help other people. A police officer notices his character and asks him to moonlight as a crime fighter.
Artists: Allu Arjun, Rao Ramesh, Murli Sharma,  Pooja Hegde

Name: Godavari
Plot: Set on a cruise boat on the river Godavari, a romance between an idealistic young man, Ram, and an independent young woman, Sita.
Artists: Sumanth, Kamalinee Mukherjee, Tanikella Bharani

Name: Balakrishnudu
Plot: A local toughie is hired as a bodyguard to protect a girl from the rivals of her family and becomes a natural target for her enemies. In the process, he ends up falling in love with her.
Artists: Nara Rohit, Regina Cassandra and Ramya Krishna.

Name: Rakhi: Highly Inflammable
Plot: A young man takes the law into his own hands; at first, it's to punish the people responsible for his sister's death, but he soon starts to target all those who have harassed women in the name of dowry.
Artists: Jr NTR, Ileana D'Cruz and Charmi.
